1: DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE: Action, Adventure

Michel Ancel, the celebrated creator of Rayman, Beyond Good & Evil, and
the Raving Rabbids, returns to unleash his innovative creativity on this
new entry into the Rayman franchise

When Rayman, Globox, and the Teensies discover a mysterious tent filled
with captivating paintings, they are suddenly transported to a series of
mythical new worlds!

Join them as they run, jump, and slap their way through each world to get
home, save the day, and discover the secrets of the legendary paintings!

1. Unrar
2. Burn or mount the image

4. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory on the image to
your game install directory
5. Play the game
6. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT!
